subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3344 is on the way
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Karolina & Mark Kane,    Updates are still proceeding normally and are expected to be delivered to you within the next couple of days. Please don't worry.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047039617273
